import consts from '../../client/utils/consts'

const HOST = process.env.HOST || '0.0.0.0'
const PORT = process.env.PORT || '3000'

export default Object.freeze({
  HOST,
  PORT,
  LB_ADDR: process.env.LB_ADDR || `http://${HOST}:${PORT}/hpi`,
  ...consts
})

export default Object.freeze({
  APP: 'hare',
  API: 'hpi',
  BASE_API: '/hpi',
  SESS_KEY: 'hare:sess',
  COOKIE_JWT: 'hare_jwt'
})

sourcesContent:
import consts from '../../client/utils/consts'

const HOST = process.env.HOST || '0.0.0.0'
const PORT = process.env.PORT || '3000'
const MONGO = 'localhost:27017'
const DB = 'fira'

export default Object.freeze({
  HOST,
  PORT,
  MONGO: `mongodb://${MONGO}/${DB}`,
  LB_ADDR: process.env.LB_ADDR || `http://${HOST}:${PORT}/api`,
  ...consts
})

export default Object.freeze({
  APP: 'ra',
  API: 'api',
  BASE_API: '/api',
  SESS_KEY: 'ra:sess',
  COOKIE_JWT: 'ra_jwt'
})

import consts from '../../client/utils/consts'

const HOST = process.env.HOST || '0.0.0.0'
const PORT = process.env.PORT || '3000'

export default Object.freeze({
  HOST,
  PORT,
  LB_ADDR: process.env.LB_ADDR || `http://${HOST}:${PORT}/api`,
  ...consts
})

export default Object.freeze({
  APP: 'sk',
  API: 'api',
  BASE_API: '/api',
  SESS_KEY: 'sk:sess',
  COOKIE_JWT: 'sk_jwt'
})

import * as dotenv from 'dotenv'
let path = process.env.NODE_ENV === 'test' ? '.env.test' : '.env'
dotenv.config({path, silent: true})

import auth from '../controllers/user.js'
import koaRouter from 'koa-router'
const router = koaRouter()

router.get('/user/:id', auth.getUserInfo) // 定义url的参数是id
router.post('/user', auth.postUserAuth)

export default router

import api from '../controllers/todolist.js'
import koaRouter from 'koa-router'
const router = koaRouter()

router.get('/todolist/:id', api.getTodolist)
router.post('/todolist', api.createTodolist)
router.delete('/todolist/:userId/:id', api.removeTodolist)
router.put('/todolist/:userId/:id/:status', api.updateTodolist)

export default router
